channel.title: {HELP ~ HELP ~ HELP}{HELP ~ HELP ~ HELP} Why is this happening?
channel.description:
When I activate "Run", I get this. And when I try to log in, I get in, everything is okay except viewing screen (Invy etc and chat box is okay), which is black. It disconnects, I try to log in again, It says I'm already logged in. I have restarted client, and the server. Help!
[code]Starting RicScape v4 Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 0" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:122) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:29)[/code]

item.title: {HELP ~ HELP ~ HELP}{HELP ~ HELP ~ HELP} Why is this happening?
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

u edited shops.cfg wrong… u dont use backspace spaces u use tab spaces.

Read full topic
item.source: {HELP ~ HELP ~ HELP}{HELP ~ HELP ~ HELP} Why is this happening?

item.title: {HELP ~ HELP ~ HELP}{HELP ~ HELP ~ HELP} Why is this happening?
item.dc:creator: @keenan009 keenan009
item.description:
@keenan009 wrote:

i would suggest a new compiler/run or a new source. i found that the vengancescape compiler/run is verry affective on most servers that i use. i hope this helps.

Read full topic
